postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
JOB DESCRIPTION -- INSIDE SALES  
 
This is a full-time position. We are seeking an individual with a talent for Inside Sales.  The successful candidate will be instrumental in achieving customer acquisition and revenue growth objectives. You will be adept at making dozens of calls per day, generating interest, qualifying prospects and closing sales while building rapport with your growing customer base.  
 
You must have a lively positive demeanor and enjoy meeting with new people every day. Your self-confidence and cheerfulness are infectious such that people take to you quickly. You enjoy a fast-paced dynamic environment and consider yourself a strong team-player. 
 
Responsibilities 
•	Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound cold calls and emails 
•	Understand customer needs and requirements 
•	Arrange in-house consultation with prospects as well as co-ordinate open house and seminar events 
•	Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas 
•	Research accounts, identify key players and generate interest 
•	Maintain relationships with and expand your database of prospects  
 
Requirements 
•	Strictly SINGAPOREANS OR PR ONLY 
•	Having experience in the adult continuing education industry is an asset 
•	Proven inside sales experience preferred 
•	Prefer interacting with people over using machines 
•	Driven by strong desire to over-achieving quota 
•	Strong phone presence and experience dialing dozens of calls per day 
•	Proficient with corporate productivity and web presentation tools 
•	Experience working with Salesforce.com or similar CRM 
•	Excellent verbal and written communications skills 
•	Strong listening and presentation skills 
•	Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively 
•	Diploma or Higher 
 
SALARY 
In terms of the salary, here is what my boss has outlined for you; 
-	Basic $2,700 with CPF 
-	Commission Target = $1,135 per month 
-	Salary = $2,700 + $1,135 = $3835 per month 
 
* If you exceed your targets, commission will be higher. Above is based on minimum target 
 
If you are keen to come for the interview, please send in your updated CV. 
 
Training will be provided.  
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted 
Job commences on 3 Jan strictly.
title: INSIDE SALES EXECUTIVE (FULL-TIME)

Corporate Sales Representative 
 
People often limit themselves to things that they are only comfortable and familiar with. No one wants to take a step and believe they can do it.  
Only YOU have control to the limits of your capabilities. Believe in yourself, test the limits of infinite and brace yourself for personal and professional development in every way. 
 
What are we looking for? 
• Great attitude and positive mentality  
• Adventurous and willing to learn 
• Must be comfortable working in teams 
• Comfortable with face to face   
   interaction

• Market client's products  
• Carry out sales to potential customers  
• Lead and run sales operations  
• Coach and educate  
 
What rewards will you gain? 
• Personal and Professional development  
• Performance based  
• Overseas exposure 
 
We all have doubts. Only you have control over your life. Discover and see yourself like you have never seen before. If not now, when?

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Secure appointments/meetings through inbound and outbound calls to acquire new prospects 
 
• Close sales through inbound and outbound calls to acquire new sales 
 
• Close sales through inbound and outbound calls to upsell and cross-sell existing customers 
 
• Keep close track of leads and conduct follow ups with customers for closure of sales 
 
• Report to the Sales & Business Development Manager 
 
 
 
Job Description 
 
• Ability to speak in Chinese 
 
• Deliver prepared sales talks, reading from scripts that describe products or services, or improvise, in order to persuade potential customers to take a desired action eg. agree to an appointment for presentation or purchase a product or service. 
 
• Schedule appointments for sales representatives to meet prospective customers or for customers to attend sales presentations or workshops. 
 
• Explain products or services and prices, and answer questions from potential customers. 
 
• Obtain potential customer information such as name, address, email, and contact numbers. 
 
• Obtain names and telephone numbers of potential customers from sources such as internet directories, telephone directories, trade directories, and lists purchased from other organizations. 
 
• Telephone or write email letters to correspondence with potential customers or to follow up initial sales contacts. 
 
• Documenting and recording information like entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information of customers. 
 
• Maintain records of contacts, accounts, and new opportunities/leads created. 
 
• Conduct client or market surveys in order to obtain information about potential customers. 
 
• Contact existing customers to promote cross-sell or up-sell of companies' products and services. 
 
• Maintains phone time or sales quotas as determined by management 
 
 
SMS interest to Keagan @ 93526073, Preferably Locals and ability to converse in Chinese
title: Administrator / Personal Assistant

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Can you speak to Senior Executives and sell Peer Groups memberships?   
 
EGN has facilitated knowledge sharing networks since 1992 and is one of the largest global professional networks with 14,000 Executives from 6.800 companies in 750 confidential network groups and cover more than 50 functions in the business community. Our groups are made up of 30 business peers who confidentially inspire, develop and qualify the decisions and actions implemented in participant companies 
 
Your job will be to advise Senior Leaders and not just be him or her that sells a membership. The role is done over the phone and is home office based with strong support with our back office and research department. You don't necessarily need to be living in Singapore.   
 
Your  experience and skills. Your background is commercial with excellent communication skills that enable you to speak to Senior Leaders. The job requires you like to sell via telephone and has a high activity level. You possess a high degree of structure, like you are independent and can organize your everyday life. 
 
Possibility of good earnings and be part of a team which has seen phenomenal growth.You are offered an attractive performance based salary model in a company which have a healthy working atmosphere and strong team spirit. Here is freedom with responsibility. Sounds ideal?   
 
Application and contact. If you have questions, please feel free to contact me on telephone +65 66 929 166. We are looking forward to hear from you. 
 
Kind regards, Peter Arnoldi.
title: Senior Sales Executive

FOREX is a global decentralized market for trading all aspects of buying, selling and exchanging currencies. 
According to the Bank for International Settlement, from the 2016, Survey show that trading in foreign exchange markets averaged $5.1 trillion per day in April 2016. 
 
My website provides information on buying and selling currencies and all Subscribers, upon agreeing on Terms, are successfully using this information to make money on a weekly basis. 
 
You, as Affiliate to my website www.sanvelforex.com, have 30% profit for each Subscriber who subscribes to www.sanvelforex.com through e-junkie.com 
 
Subscribers pay $120/month and you get 30% profit! 
When you bring only 3 Subscribers each month, you might get this much:

Corporate Sales Ambassador 
 
"If you want something you've never had, you've got to do something you've never done" 
 
Taking the first step is always difficult and it seems like the biggest hurdle, but if the first isn't even taken, your I'll never get to your destination and get a shot at greatness. We aim to provide coaching to develop individuals to become better versions of themselves and in getting closer to what they want to achieve. 
 
Requirements 
1. Thinking out of the box 
2. People oriented 
3. Self driven 
4. Enjoys facing challenges of any kind and providing solutions 
5. Singaporean/PR 
 
Jobscope 
1. Face to face marketing 
2. Raising brand awareness and testing of new products 
3. Expansion of clients' market share 
 
Incentives  
1. Uncapped earnings  
2. Travel opportunities  
3. Personal development  
4. Career advancement  
 
Live your dreams. Wait no further.

-Required language: English

-Preferably Junior Executives specializing in Sales -- Retail/General or equivalent.

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
During the internship period, you will be exposed to these areas: 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
    • Orientation and familiarisation of the products and services of the company. 
    • Client liaison -- introducing our new models to clients from publishing houses, advertising agencies, production houses, event companies, fashion houses, show producers, etc. 
    • Working hands in hands with marketing team for various branding and marketing skills of maintaining website and social media content. 
    • Scheduling and coordination of the models' rosters. 
    • Assist inquiries via email, phone or face to face. 
    • Hands-on advertising campaign of our models in different platform media, e.g. filming, write up of testimonial & execute marketing strategies. 
    • Practice good communication skills and manage expectations (Interact with external) 
 
Requirements: 
 
    Candidate must be currently pursuing at least a Diploma or Bachelor's Degree in Business Studies/Administration/Management, Economics, Marketing, Commerce or equivalent. 
    3 Internship position(s) for duration of 4 month(s). 
 
Other benefits: 
 
    Excellent working environment. 
 
    Significant career development. 
    Wage system including basic commensurate with experience and productivity incentives. 
    Training provided. 
 
 
Interested candidates, kindly apply online together with your detailed CVs stating your salary expectations and availability. 
 
(Only shortlisted candidates will be notified) 
 
Email: 
  show contact info 
 
Contact Us @ 63232171
title: Internship for Sales & Marketing Students - iModels Holdings
